reviews.text: 122 Rose Ln N1, Frisco, TX 75036 mckinleyconstructionmanagement.com mckinleyconstructionmanagement.com A salt water pool changes the way your backyard feels. Softer water, less chlorine smell, fewer chemical runs, and a swimming experience that’s easier on your skin, eyes, and hair. It’s a cleaner, more comfortable way to enjoy your pool.
